review: I'm sorry but the constant freezing and glitching out when all I'm trying to do is stream prime or hulu is getting rediculous. I spend 20-30 minutes nightly rebooting it just to have random "network unavailable" or "cannot be played" errors. If you're going to spend the money, get the big one, not the stick. Hopefully it will work better than this.
author: Zachary Richmond

review: We have two and I'm considering getting a third. Previously, we used our gaming systems to access Netflix and amazon prime TV, but this is easier. Organized very well, couldn't have been easier to install (I should say "plug in"), so many apps - History channel, PBS - and you can watch their shows! I don't have cable tv, but through a lot of apps you can watch cable shows! Perfect picture. Easy remote. I recommend!
